Name: When All Guys Turned into Girls
About the game: In this adult visual novel an ugly dyke pharmacist that can't get laid spreads a virus to turn all men into women. But two guys remain as they are, and now get unwanted female advances all the time. Features: 17 lewd scenes lots of adult jokes that will resonate both with men and women several endings and some branching in the middle free! Share it with your significant other! Warning: strong/mature language.
